Package application

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
application.MenuItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Coffee, Donut
public class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
This class holds the properties of an Object representing a Menu Item, such as Coffee or Donuts.
Author:
Abdullah Salem, Gent Blaku

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private double price  
    private int quantity  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MenuItem()
    The default constructor for a instance of an menu item class.
    MenuItem​(double itemPrice, int number)
    An overloaded constructor for a instance of an menu item class that accepts a double as a price.

  • Method Summary

    This uses the DecimalFormat class to format into dollar format.

    This method fetches the price of a Menu Item object.

    This method fetches the quantity of a Menu Item object.

    This method increments the quantity of a Menu Item Object by a certain amount.

    A method that calculates and returns the price of this item

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem()
      The default constructor for a instance of an menu item class.

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem​(double itemPrice, int number)
      An overloaded constructor for a instance of an menu item class that accepts a double as a price.
      Parameters:
      itemPrice - is the price of an item
      number - the quantity of this certain item

  • Method Details

    • itemPrice

      public double itemPrice()
      A method that calculates and returns the price of this item
      Returns:
      price, a double containing the price of the item

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice​(double number)
      This method sets the price of a Menu Item object.
      Parameters:
      number - the price to be set to.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      This method fetches the price of a Menu Item object.
      Returns:
      price the price of the Object.

    • setQuantity

      public void setQuantity​(int number)
      This method sets the quantity of a Menu Item object.
      Parameters:
      number - the quantity to be set to.

    • getQuantity

      public int getQuantity()
      This method fetches the quantity of a Menu Item object.
      Returns:
      quantity the quantity of the object.

    • incrementQuantity

      public void incrementQuantity​(int number)
      This method increments the quantity of a Menu Item Object by a certain amount.
      Parameters:
      number - the number to be incremented by.

    • formatPrice

      public java.lang.String formatPrice​(double price)
      This uses the DecimalFormat class to format into dollar format.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to be formatted
      Returns:
      a String representation of the formatted price
